description.narrative: Evidence-based policy recommendations and advocacy provided to the Government of Sri Lanka on social protection responses contributed to emergency cash transfers to the majority of the population. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:25/08/2020

target.value: 2020:Social protection system is part of COVID-19 response

actual.value: 2019:Discussions are ongoing on the use of SP system to respond to shocks, but main focus has been on reforming the SP system overall

title.narrative: Public spending on social protection from domestic resources as a proportion of national budget

target.value: 2020:Social protection expenditure, specifically cash transfers, as share of GDP, maintained or increased compared to 2019

actual.value:
2019:Public Health 1.5% of GDP
Public Education 1.9% of GDP
